node.id: My closest friend deeply wounded me.
I was left feeling betrayed and hurt by someone I considered my best friend.
The actions of my closest confidant caused me immense pain.
I was devastated by the hurtful behavior of someone I trusted wholeheartedly.
The person I held dearest to my heart inflicted a great deal of emotional pain on me.
I felt a profound sense of loss and anguish when my best friend hurt me.
